summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the Seattle Department of Parks and Recreation, authorizing acceptance of a grant from the Washington State Department of Natural Resources (DNR) Aquatic Lands Enhancement Account (ALEA) for financial assistance to support The Seattle Aquarium Master Plan, increasing the expenditure allowance in the Department's 1996 budget, authorizing an agreement with the Seattle Aquarium Society (SEAS), and making a reimbursable appropriation from the Park Fund therefor, all by three-fourths vote of the City Council.
